# Setting up virtual environment
cloned the current .vidobj environment to .vidobj_bk. Adding GPU tensorflow and Obman virtual environment together into current .viobj. Remember that have to replace pytorch for suitable version for CUDA 9.0.

Following installations instructions here:
[June 18: {N} Testing for the mano estimation](quiver-note-url/63DA1513-0DCE-41B6-8BAF-E4245662E5AA)
